quote: His lips so soft, yet so stern, he pressed his mouth to mine. ""I will have both of you,"" he said. ""My Sentinel and my city. And the GP will learn exactly how stubborn we both can be.
quote_letters: HIS LIPS SO SOFT YET SO STERN HE PRESSED HIS MOUTH TO MINE I WILL HAVE BOTH OF YOU HE SAID MY SENTINEL AND MY CITY AND THE GP WILL LEARN EXACTLY HOW STUBBORN WE BOTH CAN BE
